oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ecological modernisation in the public catering sector. Danish experiences with use of organic food
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nielsen, Thorkild
Kristensen, Niels Heine
Mikkelsen, Bent E.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Policy environments and social economy
Community development
Produce chain management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The paper is part of the proceedings of an iPOPY seminar. The authors reflect on whether and how organic food in schools and kindergartens can be described as a part of an ecological modernization strategy in Denmark. They discuss how it has merged with more economically and technically approach in public catering policy. They discuss how it has merged with more economically and technically approaches in public catering policy.
